department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering
department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班

goal.en: Surface science is an interdisciplinary subject, including physics, chemistry, materials, optoelectronics, and biomedicine in recent years, and has gradually become an important research field. This course will provide a comprehensive introduction to the foundations of surface science, engineering techniques and analytical methods.
goal.ch: 表面科學是一門跨領域的學門，包含物理、化學、材料、光電以及近年來的生物醫學等，逐漸成為一重要的研究領域。本課程將從表面科學之基礎、工程技術以及分析方式做一通盤性的介紹。

content.en: This course will introduce the key points of surface science, including basic science, process technology and testing technology, so that students can have a further understanding of surface science.
content.ch: 本課程將分別針對表面科學的關鍵重點，包含基礎學理、製程技術以及檢測技術來簡介，使學生能夠對於表面科學有進一步認識。

domain.en: 醫學電子 、 生醫材料
domain.ch: 醫學電子 、 生醫材料

en.competency: Combination of medical engineering and clinic problems

ch.competency: 醫學工程與臨床問題締合

en: Department:Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、Ph.D. Program of Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班、生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程博士班。
